an7.62:1.2: yadidaṃ puññāni → yadidaṃ puññanti (bj) | yadidaṃ puññānanti (s1-3, pts1, c1)
an7.62:1.3: bhikkhave, dīgharattaṃ katānaṃ puññānaṃ dīgharattaṃ iṭṭhaṃ → bhikkhave dīgharattaṃ iṭṭhaṃ (syā2, syā3), bhikkhave dīgharattaṃ puññānaṃ iṭṭhaṃ (?)
an7.62:2.7: ajjhāvasinti → ajjhāvasati (si, mr) | ajjhāvasanti (s1, s2, pts1)
an7.62:10.2: pathabyo me na vipajjati → puthavyo yena vuccati (bj, s1-3, pts1)
an7.62:12.1: attakāmena → atthakāmena (bj, s1, s2, pts1, mr)
